title: Missing type resolution for reference closure parameter?

milestone.title: HIR Pipeline for libcore 1.49 Complete
milestone.description: Support all of the patterns and features used in libcore 1.49 at the HIR level: this includes, and isn't limited to, complex match patterns, inline assembly, some of the more complex type system features such as specialization, etc.

body:
<!--
Thank you for filing a bug report! 🐛 Please provide a short summary of the bug,
along with any information you feel relevant to replicating the bug.
-->

I tried this code:

```rust
#[lang = "fn_once"]
trait FnOnce<T> {}

fn main() {
    let lambda = |&c| c != b'9';
}
```

I expected to see this happen: removing the lang item and feeding the lambda into `rustc`, we get this outptu

```rust
error[E0282]: type annotations needed for `&_`
 --> test.rs:3:19
  |
3 |     let lambda = |&c| c != b'9';
  |                   ^^ consider giving this closure parameter the explicit type `&_`, with the type parameters specified

error: aborting due to previous error
```

Instead, this happened: 
```rust
test.rs:6:19: error: expected T?, found reference
    6 |     let lambda = |&c| c != b'9';
      |                   ^
crab1: internal compiler error: in get_tyty, at rust/typecheck/rust-tyty-util.cc:40
0x21e2bb4 Rust::TyTy::TyVar::get_tyty() const
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty-util.cc:40
0x21c386b Rust::TyTy::ReferenceType::get_base() const
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-tyty.cc:3042
0x2229ef4 Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckPattern::visit(Rust::HIR::ReferencePattern&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-pattern.cc:371
0x20c69ed Rust::HIR::ReferencePattern::accept_vis(Rust::HIR::HIRPatternVisitor&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/hir/tree/rust-hir.cc:4713
0x222828a Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckPattern::Resolve(Rust::HIR::Pattern*, Rust::TyTy::BaseType*)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-pattern.cc:34
0x2234ffc Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckExpr::visit(Rust::HIR::ClosureExpr&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-expr.cc:1490
0x20c6e9d Rust::HIR::ClosureExpr::accept_vis(Rust::HIR::HIRExpressionVisitor&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/hir/tree/rust-hir.cc:4863
0x222c3e6 Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckExpr::Resolve(Rust::HIR::Expr*)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-expr.cc:41
0x22385be Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckStmt::visit(Rust::HIR::LetStmt&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-stmt.cc:84
0x20c6960 Rust::HIR::LetStmt::accept_vis(Rust::HIR::HIRStmtVisitor&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/hir/tree/rust-hir.cc:4695
0x22381a6 Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckStmt::Resolve(Rust::HIR::Stmt*)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-stmt.cc:34
0x22307d6 Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckExpr::visit(Rust::HIR::BlockExpr&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-expr.cc:554
0x20c72d0 Rust::HIR::BlockExpr::accept_vis(Rust::HIR::HIRExpressionVisitor&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/hir/tree/rust-hir.cc:4989
0x222c3e6 Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckExpr::Resolve(Rust::HIR::Expr*)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-expr.cc:41
0x221cda9 Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckItem::visit(Rust::HIR::Function&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-item.cc:434
0x20c734d Rust::HIR::Function::accept_vis(Rust::HIR::HIRVisItemVisitor&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/hir/tree/rust-hir.cc:5001
0x2219658 Rust::Resolver::TypeCheckItem::Resolve(Rust::HIR::Item&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check-item.cc:49
0x21b102d Rust::Resolver::TypeResolution::Resolve(Rust::HIR::Crate&)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/typecheck/rust-hir-type-check.cc:37
0x200cba9 Rust::Session::compile_crate(char const*)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc:620
0x200c257 Rust::Session::handle_input_files(int, char const**)
	/home/arthur/Git/rust-gcc/gccrs/build/gcc/../../gcc/rust/rust-session-manager.cc:381
Please submit a full bug report, with preprocessed source (by using -freport-bug).
Please include the complete backtrace with any bug report.
See <https://gcc.gnu.org/bugs/> for instructions.
```
